Text: You, my friend, are amazing.  I have wanted to rewatch these games for years... Thank you
For you guyz, worth any effort. For your words, for your help, thank you! God bless you all!
After working 12 straight hours,it is for me a very relaxing situation ,to come home and watch my favorite sport ,and  my favorite player ...thank you Nepotu!
I'm glad to hear that. You're welcome JOR23!
